Title: Any emails or other communications (eg. meeting invitations/speeches/memorandums/revised chief executive instructions or equivalent) directed at all staff about the Royal Commission on the Robo-debt Scheme send between 1 July 2023 and 21 August 2023Any emails or other communications (eg. meeting invitations/speeches/memorandums/revised chief executive instructions or equivalent) directed at all SES (or equivalent) staff about the Royal Commission on the Robo-debt Scheme send between 1 July 2023 and 20 August 2023

1. Copy of the statement of Richard Glenn dated 22/2/23 given to the Commission. 2. Copy of the statement of Iain Anderson dated 22/2/23 given to the Commission. 3. Copy of the statement of Louise McLeod dated 22/2/23 given to the Commission. 4. Copy of the statement of Michael Manthorpe dated 27/2/23 given to the Commission. 5. Copy of the final statement of Richard Glenn dated 4/6/23 given to the Commission. 6. Copies of information regarding CO’s position that current and former officers could not be compelled to give evidence to the Commission, including any legal advice received and the cost of that advice. 7. Copies of policies/procedures/guidelines describing the threshold requirement(s) warranting own motion investigation under s5(1)(b) of the Ombudsman Act. 8. Copy of CO’s final 2017 own motion investigation report into the Scheme. 9. Copies of all requests for information made by CO/delegate to the department of human services (DHS) in connection with the 2017 own motion investigation. 10. Copies of external legal advice CO sought/received regarding the 2017 own motion investigation, including copy or copies of s23 of the PGPA Act 2013 (rule 18) approvals sought by CO/delegate to spend the amount for the own motion investigation. 11. Copy of 2019 Implementation Report (including its draft) prepared by CO and provided to DHS. 12. Copies of information showing the time and cost of Iain Anderson’s attendance before the Commission, including his diary entries (both manual and electronic) showing dates of his attendance.

1. Information relating to how the Cwth Ombudsman office recognises an employees prior service and their subsequent long service entitlement when the calculation under s.18 Cwth LSL Act 1976, results in a negative number or negative credit.2. Information on allowing an employee not to have their prior service recognised if the calculation under s.18 of the LSL Act results in a negative credit/numer. FOI-2023-10093 - document 1

Under the FOI Act I would like access to the original freedom of information requests received by the Office of the Commonwealth Ombudsman that are, as at 19 April 2023, the subjects of applications for Information Commissioner review (e.g. if 10 of the FOI requests that the Office of the Commonwealth Ombudsman has received are subjects of applications for IC review as at 19 April 2023, then please provide those 10 FOI requests).
Under the FOI Act I request access to documents in the possession of the Office of the Commonwealth Ombudsman relating to Iain Anderson’s appointment as Commonwealth Ombudsman.

I am making a FOI request on reports or other documents that includes the total number of complaints that have been filed to this office in 2022, 2021, and 2020, and how many have resulted in an "investigation" of the complaint with this office providing advice or a recommendation on what the offending entity should do to resolve the matter amd statistics on what happened to the rest (information such as: closed without investigation, dropped by the complainant before decision, etc.)I only need one document that includes each year's statistics.

* I am seeking access to legal advice received from AGS or other law firms which relate to the establishment of the Defence Force Ombudsman, particularly reg 14A(1)(b) of the Ombudsman Regulations 2017 (Cth) and the phrase ‘most serious forms of abuse;’* I request access to any Standard Operating Procedures, Policies or Procedures, however described, that govern the delegate’s application of that criteria and provision and making of recommendations or decisions.
‘I request access to the records of the Office of the Commonwealth Ombudsman’s expenditures for the 2021-2022 financial year

“…documents that set out:a) the position description for the Director of the Legal Team (howsoever described) in theOffice of the Commonwealth Ombudsman; andb) the responsibilities and duties of the Director of the Legal Team (howsoever described) inthe Office of the Commonwealth Ombudsman to the extent they are not covered in theposition description documents.”
